channel.title: Poetry on stultus notes

item.title: The Road Goes Ever On - J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: Tolkien’s poem about the endless journey through life, appearing in The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.

item.title: സ്മാരകം (Smarakam) - Veerankutty
item.description: Malayalam poem about the humble flight of a dandelion seed and the monument it becomes.
